Class Device

java.lang.Object
Devices.Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
Computer, DHCPServer, DNSServer, Router, Switch, WebServer
public abstract class Device extends Object
Abstract class representing a generic network device. Provides common attributes and methods used by all types of devices.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Izzy Kavanagh

  • Method Details

    • addArpEntry

      public void addArpEntry(String ip, String mac)
      Adds an entry to an ARP table
      Parameters:
      ip - - The IP address to map.
      mac - - The corresponding MAC address.

    • lookupMac

      public String lookupMac(String ip)
      Looks up a MAC address in the ARP table using the given IP address
      Parameters:
      ip - - The IP address to look up.
      Returns:
      The associated MAC address/null if not found.
